additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Gluconate, Octyldodecanol, Steareth-2, Cyclopentasiloxane, Steareth-21, Salicylic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Cyclohexasiloxane, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Xanthan Gum, Magnesium Aluminium Silicate, Laureth-7, Menthol, CI 77891

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes and mouth. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Discontinue use if skin irritation develops. If irritation persists, please consult a doctor. With sensitive skin, test on a small area first.

description: HOW CLEARASIL RAPID ACTION PIMPLE CREAM WORKS WITH YOUR SKIN?- Pimples can be caused by blocked pores. Clearasil pimple fighting ingredients are delivered deep into the pores to open up blocked pores and help clear pimples and breakouts fast!- Dermatologist tested
name: Rapid Action Pimple Treatment Cream
